issue_description: After https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/actions/runs/4256800436/jobs/7406140055, this is a further PR for #6875

files_changed.patch:
@@ -48,7 +48,7 @@ def __init__(self):
 def roundtrip(expected):
     result = ImageQt.fromqpixmap(ImageQt.toqpixmap(expected))
     # Qt saves all pixmaps as rgb
-    assert_image_similar(result, expected.convert("RGB"), 0.5)
+    assert_image_similar(result, expected.convert("RGB"), 1)
 
 
 @pytest.mark.skipif(not ImageQt.qt_is_installed, reason="Qt bindings are not installed")
